basics.name: Kaleem Ahmad
basics.position: Certified Data Analyst & Full-Stack Artificial Intelligence Developer
basics.summary: A Computer Science graduate passionate about innovation, research, and solving real-world problems using technology.

work.name: Freelance
work.summary: Provided data-driven insights and solutions through predictive modeling and visualization, allowing clients to make more informed decisions and streamline operations.
highlights: Achieved 98% accuracy in predictive sales models.
Designed interactive dashboards with Tableau, Power BI, and Streamlit.

education.institution: Institute of Computer Sciences & Information Technology, The University of Agriculture

projects.name: Prompt-Driven Image Analysis
projects.summary: Developed a multimodel generative artificial system for image segmentation, transformation, and cognitive interpretation using prompts.
highlights: Integrated GANs and NLP for enhanced analysis.

projects.name: 3D Face Reconstruction
projects.summary: Created a deep learning model for real-time 3D face reconstruction from 2D images.
highlights: Utilized WebGL Studio and ResNet for visualization.

projects.name: Nystagmus Detection
projects.summary: Built a deep learning-based system for early detection of nystagmus through retina movement classification.

references.name: Dr. Asfandyar Khan
references.reference: Head of Department, Assistant Professor, Institute of Computer Science and Information Technology (ICS/IT), The University of Agriculture, Peshawar, Pakistan.

references.reference: Assistant Professor, Institute of Computer Science and Information Technology (ICS/IT), The University of Agriculture, Peshawar, Pakistan.
